keyword: calories in dunkin donuts boston kreme donut
title: Calories in Dunkin Donuts Boston Kreme Donut
meta_description: Discover calories in Dunkin Donuts Boston Kreme donut, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and sodium for this classic treat.
h1: Calories in Dunkin Donuts Boston Kreme Donut
assumptions: Standard yeast-raised Dunkin' Donuts Boston Kreme donut with chocolate glaze and vanilla creme filling; approximately 52 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and customizations; values based on standard U.S. Dunkin' menu data. Check app or store for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Dunkin' Donuts Boston Kreme donut contains 290 calories with 4 g protein and 34 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Dunkin Donuts Boston Kreme donut?
What are the carbs in Dunkin Boston Kreme donut?
faqs.a: About 34 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 12 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is the Boston Kreme donut high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 14 g total fat, with 6 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Dunkin Boston Kreme?
Does Dunkin Boston Kreme have trans fat?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat in the standard version.
